name: Drupal Re-Redesigned
description:
Drupal websites using the proposed redesign but heavily customized
(based on style 22216 by user 31179)

##NOTICE##: Due to the redesign process, this userstyle no longer works for drupal.org + api.drupal.org - Instead you can try style 40428 by user 63043

Works for:
* drupal.org (http and https) - NO Longer!
* api.drupal.org - NO Longer!
* groups.drupal.org

Key Features:
* Fluid layout
* More space for content
* Better contrast of certain areas

Updates:
2010.11.26 = Removed drupal.org and api.drupal.org
